pkgmetadata.longdescription: Concurrent Generation of Ordinal and Normal Data with Given Correlation Matrix and Marginal Distributions // Implementation of a procedure for generating samples from a mixed distribution of ordinal and normal random variables with a pre-specified correlation matrix and marginal distributions. The details of the method are explained in Demirtas et al. (2015) DOI:10.1080/10543406.2014.920868.
